properties.name: redlog.source.type
properties.description: Where the card are taken from.

properties.name: redlog.source.github.github-token
properties.description: Token to connect to github where the cards are

properties.name: redlog.source.github.url-mapper
properties.description: define for each application, where is the path in github

properties.name: redlog.writer.type
properties.description: define where the report information is stored and read from

properties.name: redlog.card.controller-path
properties.description: define the path for card runner endpoints

properties.name: redlog.report.controller-path
properties.description: define the path for report endpoints

properties.name: redlog.execution.controller-path
properties.description: define the path for execution endpoints
